definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: English is the official language, but Cantonese and Malay are also spoken.
sentences.chinese: 官方语言为英语，粤语和马来语同样通行。

sentences.english: The official language is Amharic, political and economic activities in the common English.
sentences.chinese: 官方语言为阿姆哈拉语，政治和经济活动中通用英语。

sentences.english: Spanish is an official language on four continents and is the mother tongue in 21 countries.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙语是四大洲21个国家的母语和官方语言。

sentences.english: Mexican Luoge in northwest Africa, the official language is Arabic.
sentences.chinese: 墨洛哥位于非洲西北部，官方语言为阿拉伯语。

sentences.english: The official language is Slovenian, which is a member of the South Slavic language group.
sentences.chinese: 官方语言是斯洛文尼亚语，属于南斯拉夫语言的一支。

sentences.english: The individual republics have often made their native language co-official next to Russian.
sentences.chinese: 各自的共和国通常也将俄语和本土母语作为官方语言。

sentences.english: The official specification for the language is published by ECMA.
sentences.chinese: ECMA公布的官方语言规范的质量极其的差。
车友会官方语言是中文。

sentences.english: Urdu and English are both recognized as the official languages of Pakistan.
sentences.chinese: 乌尔都语和英语都被作为巴基斯坦的官方语言。

sentences.english: Ukrainian is the only official state language.
sentences.chinese: 乌克兰语是唯一的官方语言。

sentences.english: Instead, Hanyu persevered and became one of the official languages.
sentences.chinese: 与之相反，汉语倒久盛不衰，并成为官方语言之一。

sentences.english: Engish is chosen as one of the official languages to be used during meetings at the UN.
sentences.chinese: 英语被选为联合国大会会议期间的官方语言之一。

sentences.english: The official languages are English, Mandarin, Malay and Tamil.
sentences.chinese: 官方语言是英语，华话，马来语和泰米尔语。

sentences.english: English and French are the official languages of Canada.
sentences.chinese: 英法二语是加拿大的官方语言。
